p1: To date, the official source of statistical information on the spread of coronavirus in Bulgaria is the Unified Information Portal - https://coronavirus.bg.
p2: The portal doesn't provide quality visualisations which show the historic development of the pandemic in Bulgaria in accessible and intuitive way.
p3: The purpose of this website is to track the spread of the infection in Bulgaria and to present chronologically the information in a systematic and visual way.
